title: Enterprise Minor Software Update Preferences
description: Preferences for Enterprise Software Update, Minor Updates Only

minorMacOSSoftwareUpdateGracePeriodinDay.title: Minor Software Update Grace Period in Days
minorMacOSSoftwareUpdateGracePeriodinDay.description: (macOSSoftwareUpdateGracePeriodinDays)-Set the number of days the user will be notified of pending updates with an option to review them in System Preferences

minorMacOSSoftwareUpdateAbsoluteDeadline.title: Absolute Deadline in Days
minorMacOSSoftwareUpdateAbsoluteDeadline.description: (macOSSoftwareUpdateAbsoluteDeadlineAfterGracePeriodinDays)-Set the number of days after the grace period after which updates will be automatically applied

customBrandingImagePath.title: Custom Branding Image Path
customBrandingImagePath.description: (customBrandingImagePath)-Set a custom image path for notifications

customDialogInsideGracePeriodText.title: Custom Inside Grace Period Window Text
customDialogInsideGracePeriodText.description: (customDialogInsideGracePeriodText)-Text the user will see when inside the grace period. Useful variables to use are dateMacBecameAwareOfUpdatesNationalRepresentation, gracePeriodDayCountdown, and gracePeriodWindowClosureDateNationalRepresentation

inputAttributes.placeholder:
Software Updates are available as of

**$dateMacBecameAwareOfUpdatesNationalRepresentation**

You have **$gracePeriodDayCountdown** days to install them before they will be auto-installed

Auto installation will start on or about

**$gracePeriodWindowClosureDateNationalRepresentation**

customDialogOutsideGracePeriodText.title: Custom Outside Grace Period Window Text
customDialogOutsideGracePeriodText.description: (customDialogOutsideGracePeriodText)-Text the user will see when outside the grace period. A wayOutsideDialog warning is available if you've set an aggressive deadline

inputAttributes.placeholder:
Updates are available which we'd suggest installing today at your earliest convenience

You'll be presented with available updates to install after clicking 'Review'.

$wayOutsideDialogWarning

updateAttitude.title: Update Attitude
updateAttitude.description: (updateAttitude)-Update with aggressive attitude. Also requires a way outside grace period date set and a max idle time before aggressive update set

aggressiveUpdateIdleTimeinMinutes.title: Idle time in Minutes
aggressiveUpdateIdleTimeinMinutes.description: (aggressiveUpdateIdleTimeinMinutes)-If update attitude is set to aggressive, set the Mac idle time in minutes after which updates will be automatically applied

doNotDisturbAppBundleIDs.title: Do not Disturb App Bundle IDs
doNotDisturbAppBundleIDs.description: (doNotDisturbAppBundleIDs)-A list of application bundle IDs, any one of which will override any notifications for updates if they are the app currently in focus

respectDNDApplications.title: Respect Do Not Disturb Application
respectDNDApplications.description: (respectDNDApplications)-Enables or disables the suppression of notification if a do not disturb bundle ID is the frontmost application

minorMacOSUpdateInsideGracePeriodEvent.title: Major macOS Update Inside Grace Period Jamf Event
minorMacOSUpdateInsideGracePeriodEvent.description: (minorMacOSUpdateInsideGracePeriodEvent)-Jamf event that triggers a minor software update within the defined grace period

minorMacOSUpdateOutsideGracePeriodEvent.title: Minor macOS Update Outside Grace Period Jamf Event
minorMacOSUpdateOutsideGracePeriodEvent.description: (minorMacOSUpdateInsideGracePeriodEvent)-Jamf event that triggers a major software update without the defined grace period
